if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

Outdoor Faucet Covers for Winter, 2 PCS 6″Wx 9″H Reusable Outside Faucet Insulated Cover Socks, Freeze Protection Garden Hose Cover Socks for Wall Taps Outside
【High Compatibility】 Faucet cover measures 9in x 6in, 2.3 inch thick. It is about 1-2 inch larger and 1inch thicker than most of other faucet socks. Works well with various faucet types, such as garden spigots, hose bibs, water tap, keep faucets protected in freezing weather.
【Quick & Easy Installtion 】 The faucet socks with Velcro straps are easy to put on and take off even you wear gloves in cold winter. Simply pull the cover over the faucet/tap and fasten it tightly with the Velcro strap. A few seconds is all it takes!
【Superior Protection】 Very thick faucet cover design. In winter protecting your outside faucets from freezing and bursting. In summer prevent faucets from the blazing sun or the rust. Help save costly repairs. It has the functions of antifreeze, rainproof, snowproof, sun exposure, windproof and dust prevention.
【Super Waterproof & Insulation】The water faucet cover for winter is constructed of 3 layers – 210D oxford cloth waterproof coating thicker insulated silk cotton 190t taffeta waterproof coating, making it durable and reusable season after season. effectively keep the faucet dry and warm during.
【Please Confirm Again】You will receive 2 pack faucet protective covers. Please measure the size before purchase,If you don’t know the size of your faucet, you can try to buy. It works well with various faucet types. If you have any questions, please contact us in time. We will reply within 24 hours.

Fiskars Non-stick Micro-Tip Pruning Snips feature precise blades that cut all the way to the tip for clean, healthy cuts on plants in tight spaces
Non-stick blade coating helps reduce jamming and resin build-up when cutting through sticky plants
Awarded the Arthritis Foundation’s ease of use commendation for a design that’s ideal for those with arthritis or limited hand strength

Easy Action spring gently opens blades after each cut to help reduce hand fatigue
SoftGrip touchpoints enhance comfort and control
Easy-open lock protects blades during transport and storage
Full lifetime warranty

SOLAR POWERED & 8 MODES：Put the Christmas Lollipop stake lights outdoor and keep the switch “ON”, it will automatically charge during the day and light up at night. It only takes 4-5 hours to charge when fully charged, and work 6-8 hours. There are 8 Lighting Modes: combination, in waves, sequential, slogs, chasing/flash, slow fade, twinkle/flash and steady on. Note: the solar power is light control, the pathway lights will not light up with the daylight.
WATERPROOF & EASY TO INSTALL：Fcysy Lollipop Led Christmas Lights outdoor are IP44 waterproof which means it can stand with any weather condition. Easy to install, you can stake the Xmas lights to anywhere you want to decorate.
PERFECT CHRISTMAS DÉCOR OUTDOOR: Brighten your Garden with our classic solar lollipop lights. Solar Christmas lights outdoor waterproof can be used in pathway, walkway, and driveway, front yards, garden and lawn decoration. Share the warm Christmas atmosphere with your neighbors.
IDEAL CHRISTMAS GIFT: This cute and warm light up lollipop yard light is perfect gift for friends and family. It is a useful Christmas and holiday Day gift to decorate festival, can be placed anywhere outside your home to create perfect holiday atmosphere.

Package includes 4 pieces of fine point black permanent markers, suitable for applying in a home, gardening, work, and other kinds of long-term marking work, which can meet your daily needs.
Mr. Pen garden marker is made of opaque ink that is chemically stable, lightfast, and quick-dry. Oil-based ink is odorless, non-toxic, acid-free, and environmentally friendly.
Durable fine round nib allows smooth and precise application. Our permanent pen markers that are short in size and have smooth and quick drying ink, can optimize your writing experience.
Mr. Pen garden markers are ideal for working on multiple surfaces; they can be applied to paintings, ceramics, wood, leather, plastic, fabric, canvas, stone, glass, metal, chalkboard, craft supplies, etc.
They are suitable for vegetable seedlings, greenhouses, gardening projects, pot experiments, etc. They will help you never lose track of what you planted.

Package Included: 5 Pcs Christmas yard signs – Ginch, Whoville Pole, Cindy Lou Who, Max, Gift Box, Ginch and Whoville Pole are respectively composed of two pieces. Lovely and unique design is really suitable for Christmas decorations outdoor.
Shining at Night: This Christmas yard sign comes with two 13ft long LED colorful light strings, can twining round the yard signs to emit brilliant lights at night. The battery box is not waterproof and needs to be shielded when used outdoors on rainy days, giving you a beautiful night.The string lights use 3 AA batteries, can last 60-100H.
High-Quality Material: This Grinch yard signs are made of thickened corrugated cardboard, which is waterproof and environmentally friendly.
Easy to Assemble: This Christmas lawn decorations kit contains 4Pcs 6’’ plastic stakes, 6Pcs 12’’ plastic stakes, 2Pcs H-shaped support. You only need to use short stake to assemble Ginch sign and Whoville Pole together, and then use H-shaped support to fix Ginch and Whoville Pole on the lawn. Cindy Lou Who, Max and Gift Box respectively use two 12 inch plastic stakes to insert on the lawn. It’s very easy to assemble the outdoor decoration for Christmas!
Various Applications: The Xmas yard sign go extremely well with the Christmas lawn and yard decorations. You may place them in your lawn to make your Christmas merry and leave your guests and family with fascinating and enduring holiday memories.

[More Efficient & Safer Light Sensors]-We use a more advanced monocrystalline solar panel and have upgraded its size. It can now receive, store and release solar energy more efficiently, dramatically increasing the solar energy conversion rate, meaning shorter charging times and longer lighting times. All modules are IP65 waterproof, whether it is raining, foggy or snowing can be used outdoors. Usually it can work up to 10-12 hours after 4-6 hours of charging in direct sunlight.
[Variable Lighting Modes to Create Various Ambiance]-The solar starlight light has 8 different lighting modes that can be adjusted by the ‘mode’ button behind the solar panel. And the built-in memory chip with memory function, every time you turn it on or when the night comes, it will automatically adopt the mode set for you last time. You can adjust to the most suitable lighting mode according to the need for decoration or different situations.
[Extra-Long & Widely Used Outdoor/Indoor String Lights]-The solar LED string lights are 66FT long, the spacing of LED beads is 10cm, and the lead length is 6FT, which can be easily installed in the place where decoration is needed. It can be molded into various shapes for gardens, courtyards, trees, porches, roofs, fences bistros, restaurants, hotels, commercial buildings. It can also be used in weddings, parties, Christmas, New Year parties to create a warm, joyful and festive ambiance.
[Be The Most Responsible Seller]-We are committed to provide you with high quality products. If you encounter any problem in the process of using solar string lights, please feel free to contact us, we will provide 7*24 hours technical service, you just need to send an email to the buyer center, we will reply within 8 hours.NOTE: It will automatically charge and light up at night when the switch behind the solar panel is turned on.

From the brand

【Remote Control & 4 Lighting Modes】The solar outdoor lights is equipped with a wireless remote control, allowing you to select the most appropriate mode more conveniently. No longer need to take it off and set it like other solar light(you need to manually press the switch for the first time). The solar panel and spotlights can be rotated to any angle you desire.
【4 Adjustable Heads & Solar Panel】4-head adjustable design, which can move up, down and horizontally. The solar panel can be adjusted at will to ensure that each angle can absorb sunlight to the maximum extent. The illumination angle of up to 270 ° and the sensing distance of 26 feet can provide additional brightness and a larger visible area.
【All weather】This solar lamp is made of durable materials to ensure that outdoor lamps can work normally even in heavy rain and snowstorm. IP65 is waterproof and designed to withstand extreme weather conditions.
【Easy to install, long working time】Easy to install without annoying wires or adapters, Only using the included screws to fix on any exterior wall constructed of all types.The built-in 1800mAh high-efficiency solar cell, so please install these lights in the sun to charge the battery.

item.title: Fairy Gardens,Fairy a Garden Set with Planting Tools,Fairy House Kit for 5,6,7,8,9,10,11,12 Year Old Boys and Girls to Play and Plant,Suitable for Children as Birthday Gifts
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) 🌱【Create Your Own Magic Cottage】:This fairy house set lets your little one grow plants using the included soil,gardening tools.Observe the whole process of plants from sowing,germination,flowering,and fruiting,experience the fun of planting,and feel the tenacity of life in nature.You can also add your favorite plants or flowers to create your own ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $19.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 07:09:50 UTC – Details)



【Create Your Own Magic Cottage】:This fairy house set lets your little one grow plants using the included soil,gardening tools.Observe the whole process of plants from sowing,germination,flowering,and fruiting,experience the fun of planting,and feel the tenacity of life in nature.You can also add your favorite plants or flowers to create your own magic gardens for even more fun.
【A kids Garden Suitable for Cultivating STEM】:This flower garden toy allows your child to experience the full process of plant growth: planting,growing,flowering,fruiting.In the process, children can take a closer look at their own small garden, connect with nature through the garden set, and learn about botany and the life cycle of plants.Planting a fairy gardens is a great activity that develops planting skills, responsibility and confidence.
【Fairy Gardens Craft Kit】:The fairy house kit includes a shovel, water can, garden toy rake, pink flower pot, mushroom house, fairy tale house,table and chairs,2 soils,and instructions for the children’s plant growth kit.With these garden tools,kids can grow their own fairy house and even decorate with some pebbles,garden toys or other fun things to play in the magical fairy world you create!
【Start Growing Your Magic Cottage Magical Cottage】: Install the main body of the fairy hut following the instructions included,soak the soil in water,pour it over the upper and lower parts of the pot,place the plant in the soil with a tool.Water the plant as needed and make sure it also gets sunlight.You can play your magical gardening play set indoors or out!Watch your garden every day to see the plant sprout and grow,as well as plant your favorite flowers.
【Unique Gifts for Kids】:Magic kids garden kits for girls and boys ages 3 and up are unique gifts for little ones on birthdays,Christmas, Thanksgiving and more.Children will have fun looking after their magic garden.This toy is suitable for children over 3 years old.For safety reasons,it is recommended that parents accompany children to play together.If you have any questions about toy flower garden,please feel free to contact us.We will get back to you within 24 hours.

Price: $19.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 07:09:50 UTC – Details)
